attributes.action: Reversing changes to the good character requirement for naturalisation.
attributes.additional_details: The current revisions are unfair and unnecessarily complicated for many applicants. I urge the government to reconsider this policy and revert to the original standards that allowed for a fairer, clearer, and more just naturalisation process.
attributes.background: I am calling for the removal of the recent changes to the good character requirement for naturalisation and a return to the previous guidelines.
